entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 24 March 2023
